transcript.text:
￼


















Mailing & Fulfilment

1 min
with the rising demand for printing and mailing, it was very difficult for the customers to first hire a printing partner and then look for a mailing partner to send their printed products to the desired addresses from managing orders to mailing your customers’ products we’ve got you covered we have introduced this module where you can allow your customers to design their printing product, place an order via your ops print website and you can fulfill their mailing needs via third party integration or self mailing services your customers will get a simplified mailing estimation, a platform to personalize and order their products some of the frequently ordered mailing products are – brochures, postcards, letters, etc this module has everything you need to easily offer online direct mail services at onprintshop we have created a solution that will help your customers design, print & manage their direct mail more frequently than ever some of the key features of the mailing and printing module include – offer mailing services to b2c & b2b customers offer different postage classes & print options online estimate print, mailing & postage costs a customer can upload multiple mailing lists in excel and csv format merge multiple mailing lists in a single order save all the mailing lists in customers’ accounts to reuse in the second order
Did this page help you?
